item.title: Twelve-Factor Applications
item.description: This post is just my notes about Twelve-Factor Applications. You can consider it my extended version of the original website. “Twelve-factor applications” is a methodology that focus mainly on developing software-as-a-service applications (or SAAS for short). Although that’s was the main concern, factors in this methodology can be used or inspire engineering practices in other types of software development. Facor 1 - Codebase One codebase tracked in revision control, many deploys.
